Item.Name: CalculationDefaults
Item.Description: Default values used in quantity calculation

Property.Name: FloorCeilingDetectionHeightLimit
Property.Description: The height limit of the automatic floor and ceiling detection (meters) ->

Property.Name: DoorThresholdDetectionHeightLimit
Property.Description: The height limit of the automatic door detection for threshold calculation (meters) ->

Property.Name: CeilingDetectionTopHeightLimit
Property.Description: The top height limit of automatic ceiling detection (meters) ->

Item.Name: IDTagsDefaults
Item.Description: Default values used for ID tags creation

Property.Name: IDTagsTextFontName
Property.Description: The font name of the ID tags text ->
